sample_id.Description: A sample identifier of the form sample-<label>, matching a sample entity found in the dataset. The combination of sample_id and participant_id MUST be unique.

participant_id.Description: A participant identifier of the form participant-<label>, matching a participant entity found in the dataset. The combination of sample_id and participant_id MUST be unique.

sample_type.Description: type of sample from ENCODE Biosample Type (https://www.encodeproject.org/profiles/biosample_type)
